description:
Peanut butter and chocolate, is there a more perfect pairing? Maybe, but it is definitely top 5, and it is a delicious way to fuel your next training session. Having solved the energy chew, Skratch Labs set their sights on creating an energy bar that tastes like a coffee shop cookie but delivers the fuel your body needs, and it’s easy to digest.

  • Plant-based ingredients allow for fast absorption and easy digestion
  • 100% non-GMO ingredients
  • 50% less sugar than the average energy bar
  • Ingredients: peanut butter, coconut nectar, tapioca syrup solids, semi-sweet chocolate (sugar, chocolate liquor, cocoa butter), roasted peanuts, oats, brown rice crisps, quinoa crisps, vegetable glycerine, oat flour, sorghum flakes, peanut oil, sea salt, sunflower lecithin
  • Allergens: peanuts, tree nuts (coconut)
name: Skratch Labs Energy Bar Peanut Butter and Chocolate
